document_data.name: Barandos Hawklin
document_data.mainbody: '''Barandos Hawklin''' was the popular head of the  [[Hawklin]] noble family in [[Suzail]] in [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Barandos had a particularly sharp wit and was noted as a charmer of ladies both high and low born. His fairness and integrity were as well known as his wealth.
document_data.History: By [[1368 DR]] Barandos' leadership of the [[Hawklin]] family had led them into much prosperity through various investments in and around the city. Among these, first and foremost, was his support and sponsoring of local adventuring companies.
